verses.verse: (Praise for Godâ€™s Help) (Ps 103.1) Praise the LORD! Praise the LORD, O my soul!
(Ps 104.33) I will praise the LORD as long as I live; I will sing praises to my God all my life long.
(Ps 118.8; Isa 2.22) Do not put your trust in princes, in mortals, in whom there is no help.
(Ps 104.29; Eccl 12.7) When their breath departs, they return to the earth; on that very day their plans perish.
(Ps 71.5; 144.15) Happy are those whose help is the God of Jacob, whose hope is in the LORD their God,
(Ps 117.2; Acts 14.15) who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that is in them; who keeps faith forever;
(Ps 68.6; 103.6; 107.9) who executes justice for the oppressed; who gives food to the hungry. The LORD sets the prisoners free;
(Ps 145.14; Mt 9.30; Jn 9.7) the LORD opens the eyes of the blind. The LORD lifts up those who are bowed down; the LORD loves the righteous.
(Ex 22.21; Ps 68.5; 147.6) The LORD watches over the strangers; he upholds the orphan and the widow, but the way of the wicked he brings to ruin.
(Ex 15.18; Ps 10.16; Rev 11.15) The LORD will reign forever, your God, O Zion, for all generations. Praise the LORD!
